summary: The diff implements UPI QR code panel and Bank Details card in DonationSection.tsx with copy-to-clipboard functionality, toast confirmations, and maroon/gold styling. Most requirements are met, but the actual UPI QR code image asset (upi-qr-code.dim_400x500.png) is not present in the diff, and the BHIM UPI branding label is not confirmed in the truncated code.

missing_requirements.reason: No image file was added (ADDED FILES: none). The actual image asset upi-qr-code.dim_400x500.png is absent from the added files list. BHIM UPI branding label presence cannot be confirmed as the DonationSection.tsx diff is truncated.
